website_summaries.verdict: If your top priority is a small footprint, this affordable gas-powered model is a good option despite some issues.
pros: Attractive small gas range that is easy to convert to propane, and comes with the conversion kit
Has a storage drawer and comes with a broiler pan
2.1 cubic foot size makes it perfect for small kitchens and RVs
cons: Quality control issues and damage upon delivery reported
Some reports of burners not working

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, on time. Opened package which had very minor damage in a small area, nothing to alert me to what I'd find. Side slightly bent and still I thought, no problem. Bottom drawer crushed (Obviously prior to factory packing), Oven seal ripped half off and hanging loosely, and glass oven light cover is in pieces. Quality control on this product at the factory is apparently not functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Mopps

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware!! service is an issue with this unit
customer_reviews.text: I paid Al's Appliance $100 to convert this stove to propane. he tells me he will never do another one. it's converted but the oven is very difficult to light and will not heat up. I called the 1-800 # on the stove for customer support and was told there are no aurthorized service agents in my area. since I modified the stove to propane returning is not an option. If I had known how difficult converting to propane was I would never have purchased this unt I have 650.00 into a 20" oven that doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great stove!
customer_reviews.text: Great stove! Easy to set up for propane. I have done many propane conversions from frigerators to dryers and this was one was by far easier. I have read all the negative reviews and every one of the issues mentioned could have been solved just by following the simple instructions on how to install and also adjust the flame if need be. My stove made it all the way to Alaska without a scratch or dent, and yes even thou your box showed no damage, just flip it side ways or up side down like the freight companies do and you can damage the stove and yet the outside box still looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price, Cute Stove
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for the price. I was nervous: the picture shows "stainless", the description says "black". The top is stainless and the sides are black. It's inexpensive but kind of cute. The glass door shades from white to dark glass which is a little odd but for the price I can live with it. Price was good and it was delivered within 48 hours. Hard to find attractive small apartment appliances, this is quite a bit better than the cheap white stoves.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: This stove fits perfectly in our converted school bus. We never could get the electric ignite to work, so we just use a match every time we cook. Great stove for small spaces. No complaints, I am sure the ignite switch issue is user error.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Bleish

customer_reviews.title: Quality stove for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this stove! I should've posted a review earlier, but it fits in my little kitchen, and it matches my Samsung fridge and other appliances perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda H

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the stove for the tiny house we are building but it came badly damaged. Unfortunately we didn’t unpack it until after the return window was closed and there is no way provided to contact the company to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Dented side panel
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this stove, only issue was one side panel was dented, hopefully it won't affect its performance. Had hoped to order just the panel but would have had to return the whole stove. Amazon gave me a 5% refund.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley1961

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Last!
customer_reviews.text: I had this stove for 3 years, two of the burners went out and now the oven just failed. Make sure you buy the warranty. I called Amazon for assistance thinking I could get some help since I spent $515.00 for a stove because no stove is supposed to stopped working in 3 years regardless when you barely used it for one person..where is the customer service?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: looks like it was drooped from the truck from 10 feet
customer_reviews.text: looks like it was drooped from the truck from 10 feet !!!!!,,, both sides buckled out , bottom braces bent up like a teetee,,,, was leaning to one side like it would fall over,,,, and box was perfect !!!! real nice,,, so happens im pretty good at fixing stuff ,, got 5 hours into fixing the body and dont even know if it works ,,,, but other than that it is what i am looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this stove
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stove. We converted to propane and installed in our RV. Oven cooks very evenly and unit doesn't heat up the inside of the RV like the camper stove it replaced. Do wish that it had an indicator to tell you when the oven is heated to the desired temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the top broiler burner
customer_reviews.text: All but 2 of the burner knobs have broken through regular use. You guys need to add glass reinforcement to the knobs! Real stainless, holding up well thus far. Oven temp is consistent. Love the top broiler burner, most units this size make you use the bottom drawer as a "broiler" using the oven burner as a broiler burner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We have had this for about two months now and are using it at our vacation rental. Works well and fits in perfectly with our small cabin. Will update if antything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mareque Steele

customer_reviews.title: Does not last over a year
customer_reviews.text: After less than 1 year of use the oven won't stay lit anymore. After troubleshooting and following guides nothing has really helped the problem. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: azaora

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!!
customer_reviews.text: If you turn a burner's valve on you will receive gas ! Even if you don't light the burner with the ignitor or a match you will receive gas. Just be smart. It fits in my tiny kitchen and in years it's worked like a champ. I couldn't be happier with this buy. I especially like the top burner broiler, just like it's bigger brother's broilers. And it's ready for propane too. This is a buy and hold recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: BAT guy

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough two day shipping had a dent in the back
customer_reviews.text: Hot water hook-up was in a different location than normally located came with a dent in the back of the unit other than that decent stove for small space area, update not even two months later and the top of the stove has color changing I have not used anything other than soapy water to clean it hopefully the insurance plan I purchased will help this out
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Great.

customer_reviews.title: We're so happy with our product
customer_reviews.text: We're so happy with our product. ..so far all parts working finr, no dents seen. Only thing was it didn't arrive on expected date. But, wait was no too long. Pretty happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: eliza

customer_reviews.title: Really nice apartment-size gas stove!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I upgraded my old stove to this newer model in my smaller basement flat. It has closed-door broiling which is nice and storage underneath for pans. I like that it has an electronic ignition for gas so that it is more energy efficient. I haven't made anything on it yet but hope to get a lot of use from it.
customer_reviews.author: SQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but came dented.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice but came with a dent in the top left side panel. I left feed back immediately but haven't heard anything back yet that is why 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Watkins-Atwood

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one was perfect! I use mind with my outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.text: 1st one delivered damaged, 2nd one delivered damaged, 3rd one was perfect! I use mind with my outdoor kitchen, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, converting to propane a pain due to fitting locations
customer_reviews.author: Sean K Osborn

customer_reviews.title: right side is completely bent in upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I like the range, and though it works, it came completely bent in on one side. The box itself was not bent which leads me to believe it was bent before it was boxed up. Because the side is hidden next to the wall, and it would have been a lot of work to box it back up, I decided to keep it. I do feel I should get at least a discount for the damaged range, but there is no mechanism to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stove!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a stove this narrow to fit into a tight space in my cooking Island and it's perfect . Have had it for some time with daily use and it has been excellent. Was also promptly delivered and one of the best prices I could find on the web.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: Shattered door
customer_reviews.text: After our original order was sent back because the glass door was shattered, we ordered a replacement one. When that arrived, we opened it up only to find that the glass door on that one was also shattered. We sent it back and have now got a range from a local shop - a little more expensive but the door is intact.
customer_reviews.author: bibliobrit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for our 1957 mon o coach camper. very good quality. very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dave delmonaco

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time with this one
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and smashed. Don’t waste your time with this one, it’s not worth the headache. We refused shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Guy G.

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to use these
customer_reviews.text: I have a Purchased server all of these units over the years for tiny homes. They seem to be well-made and very reliable – so far absolutely no problems
customer_reviews.author: eddie greene

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stove cooks just like the big boys
customer_reviews.author: Kjc ssbn

customer_reviews.title: A great range in a small package
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small range for a kitchen in our in-laws apartment, and the reality is that this works just as well as a regular sized one, and takes up much less space. How often do you really need 5 burners??? Personally, 3 is a max. The over is quite spacious as well - and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: AFoti

customer_reviews.title: nice clean steel
customer_reviews.text: Good price, steel top is easy to clean, easy to connect, needed small range. Plastic knobs and oven door a little wimpy, but functional. It was hard for me to level against a wall and cabinet, but I don't know if any range could make this easy.
customer_reviews.author: John Hainly

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived with a large dent in the front ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with a large dent in the front near the knob. I need someone to contact me about this. Hello????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THERE ARE DENTS IN THE STOVE AND IT IS VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: THERE ARE DENTS IN THE STOVE AND IT IS VERY CHEEP MADE, MY ONLY RECOURSE IS SEND IT BACK OR SEND IT BACK, REALLY
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: They are also not easily replaced. We finally found a company that sells ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time finding a stainless steel stove of this size, and that's why we got it. I gave the stove two stars because all of the knobs have broken since we bought it about six months ago. They are also not easily replaced. We finally found a company that sells these knobs and they are back ordered for four months! The oven is tricky to turn on and only works some of the time. We have already discussed cutting our losses on the stove and getting a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Heeberjeeb

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but all 6 knobs came broken and on 2 month back order.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the unit but it came with all the knobs broken and the seller on amazon will not help me because it was 2 months before I opened it and installed it. I called the manufacturer and they offered to replace free of charge but said they are on back order for the next 60 days. I have to use pliers to use my new stove now!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Zero Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: No Customer Support Whatsoever for a VERY EXPENSIVE unit that arrived non functional from the factory, per the local gas company and appliance repair company. Money Down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Not good, poor quality range
customer_reviews.text: I have the same for several years. This is 100% crap range. The oven cannot keep the temperature, so any change in temperature leads to shut off. Oven and stove use the same electronic ignition so sparks are everywhere despite if you want to start oven or one of the top burners. The quality is very poor - the marks arround knobs disapper withn couple of months. If you change temperature of the oven to lower it dies. In sum - do not waste money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: ATZ100

customer_reviews.title: Oven issues!
customer_reviews.text: I like the stone. The finish is attractive. The range top works ok. I wish the burners would simmer better. I believe there is some adjustments i can do but i haven't done that yet. The oven is an issue. A week into ownership the oven doesn't want to light or stay lit. We really struggled to get the oven to stay lit. Now the oven is burning the bottom of everything. We preheat. We put things on top rack. Everything still burns on the bottom. I've emailed but gotten no response. I did notice that reviewers of the 24 inch model complained of these save issues. I might beware.
customer_reviews.author: dabby66

customer_reviews.title: Many issues
customer_reviews.text: Oven needs a propane match to light. Never lit on its own. The black "panels" on either side of the knobs fell off, and you can't pull off knob to clean. The oven light knob broke off and the light stays on. Now the oven door won't close all the way and I have to use a shim to wedge it closed so it will heat up properly. But the stove top is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I had this on a trawler for 8 years. Sold the boat and now buying another one for the next boat.
customer_reviews.author: Exumaa

customer_reviews.title: Avanti Customer Service Poor
customer_reviews.text: I two of these ranges in my apartments. The quality is sub par however they work. Needed to replace the knobs. Gave Avanti the range model right off the label in the lower drawer. The knobs they sent don't fit they just fall off. Requested a refund but was told i would have to pay shipping. Here's the problem. They charged $12.95 for shipping but only paid $3.95. Avanti customers are not only not appreciated they're taken advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: Delmartian

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Make sure your Avanti purchase (of any size) has an authorized repairman in your area.
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure that your area has an authorized Avanti repair company in your area before you buy. I bought one that was defective, was informed there was no support in my area and I could get it replaced by cutting off the plug, removing the ID plate and sending both with a 10 dollar processing fee to Avanti. In 10-14 days they will send a replacement. Of course you have to unload it from the truck, install it yourself and figure out how to get rid of the paper weight range that's left in your charge.
customer_reviews.author: Herbager

customer_reviews.title: I could not reach the seller
customer_reviews.text: I received damaged good and I could not reach the seller to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Nice 👍
customer_reviews.text: I would like one without an Oven,lol...just storage for me, I want this, it's cute and would give more space on either side..
customer_reviews.author: Cod

customer_reviews.title: Sure to break parts not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: 2 Year update;..Model is DISCONTINUED. Cannot find replacement knobs even tried email ITALY . knobs are very cheap and break off at the drop of a pin. DO NOT RECCOMEND BUYING FROM THIS MFR.
customer_reviews.author: truth be told

customer_reviews.title: I don't want a 20"gas range stove in eclectic I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want a 20"gas range stove in eclectic I want a 20"gas range stove plan jam stove
customer_reviews.author: Glen Pruden

customer_reviews.title: Quality Range
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but very nice quality with lots of stainless, including cooktop. Closed burners, electronic start, glass window. Very attractive and we'll made. Even has a pan storage drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Royal Marten

product_meta.title: Avanti GR2013CSS Gas Range, 20", Black,Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: GR2013CSS Finish: Stainless Steel Features: -Automatic electronic ignition. -See-thru glass oven door. -Oven cavity light. -Waist high broiler. -Bake / broil oven for maximum versatility. -Four sealed type burners: 1 Rapid, 2 semi-rapid, 1 simmer. Oven Capacity: -2.1 Cubic Feet. Product Type: -Free-standing. Control Type: -Knobs. Accessories Included: -Oven drawer/Storage drawer/Backsplash/Burner. Number of Ovens: -Single oven. Fuel Type: -Gas. Number of Burners: -4. Commercial Use: -Yes. Dimensions: Overall Height - Top to Bottom: -39.5". Overall Width - Side to Side: -19.75". Overall Depth - Front to Back: -40". Overall Product Weight: -104 lbs.
feature_bullets: Four Sealed Type Burners Rapid, Simi Rapid, and Simmer.Carton Dimensions: 40 H x 22 W x 26 D (Inches)
LP Conversion Kit Included and see-thru glass oven door,oven cavity light
Oven Temperature Range:300° - 500° F (149° - 260° C). Power 120V /60HZ

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars65 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
